developer._instruction: Add all parties that developed this computational model version. Note that these developers will overwrite the developer list provided for the overarching computational model.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.

format._instruction: Add the content type of this computational model version, or the content types of the files composing the model version.

inputData._instruction: Add the data that was used as input for this computational model version.

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add all computational model versions that can be used alternatively to this computational model version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the computational model version preceding this computational model version.

license._instruction: Add all licenses of this computational model version.

outputData._instruction: Add the data that was generated as output by this computational model version.
